projectDescriptions:
Promin App

Promin (in Ukrainian: Промінь - ray of light) is a handbook on psychological care during wartime. It was created by the team of volunteers to support civilian population of Ukraine during a full-scale invasion.


Tech Stack:

  • React-Native via Expo
  • JavaScript + React.js / Webpack
  • Docker-compose + Python

Workday Extend

Workday Extend empowers customers to confidently build, deploy, and manage new business capabilities for finance and HR. Architected on the same platform as Workday's applications, Extend delivers enterprise scale and speeds development. Read More »


Tech Stack:

  • Node.js + Express.js / Golang + Echo
  • TypeScript + React.js / Webpack
  • Workday Canvas Kit
  • AWS + Docker

MotoPress

MotoPress Visual Page Builder enhances the standard WordPress builder and enables to build websites visually. It’s the complete solution for building responsive pages without coding and simply by dragging and dropping content elements.


Tech Stack:

  • Ubuntu LAMP stack
  • jQuery /JMVC / Grunt.js
  • WordPress / Composer
